plot: A warrior, cursed to live forever, pursues his latest nemesis into our time. He finds a world he must fit into, long enough to save.
title: Chakan the Forever Man
plot_es: A warrior, cursed to live forever, pursues his latest nemesis into our time. He finds a world he must fit into, long enough to save.
plot_en: A warrior, cursed to live forever, pursues his latest nemesis into our time. He finds a world he must fit into, long enough to save.
